item.title: AI Sandbox for GoLand - Tue Nov 04 12:33:44 UTC 2025
item.description:
AI Sandbox streamlines working with local LLMs (Llama 3, Phi-3, DeepSeek Coder via Ollama) directly in GoLand. It adds a dedicated editor panel to download models, run...
vendor: JetBrains s.r.o. downloads: 3 pricingModel: FREE xmlId: org.jetbrains.plugins.ai_sandbox
